name: User makes a Patch Request against the service.

testSteps.description:
Given Mathew has a list of vehicles to be Compared:
| code | llpCode |
| IUT201813DS6L62B | 2TB |
| CUD201811WDEL75A | 2TA |

And has a stateCode for the Comparison
| stateCode |
| LA |
When The user makes a PATCH request to the Configuration-Service

children.description: Mathew executes a PUT on the resource /configuration-compare/compare

restQuery.responseHeaders:
Server: AkamaiGHost
Mime-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/html
Content-Length: 298
Cache-Control: max-age=3600
Expires: Fri, 20 Dec 2019 20:00:25 GMT
Date: Fri, 20 Dec 2019 19:00:25 GMT
Connection: close
X-Akam-SW-Version: 0.5.0
Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=15778476
restQuery.responseBody:
Unsupported Request

PATCH to http://www.chrysler.com/hostd/api/configuration-compare/compare not supported.

Reference #8.fad3e743.1576868425.7245b08

testSteps.description: Then Should get a 501 response with the Error Message.

userStory.storyName: Gives Appropriate error messages for Request Failures
userStory.narrative: The Service will provide enough Messages and indication of the Failure of the Request to the User.

featureTag.name: Model compare/Gives Appropriate error messages for Request Failures
featureTag.displayName: Model compare/Gives Appropriate error messages for Request Failures

title: User makes a Patch Request against the service.
